boardgame.description: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: Jack the Ripper _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; West End Adventures is a standalone expansion to Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective with updated graphics that features ten more cases to be solved in Sherlock Holmes' Victorian-era London, England. A _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;London Directory_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, map, and newspaper archives are included with the cases._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Included are six independent _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;West End Adventures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cases (redesigned and updated from the 1995 expansion), and a series of four new cases based on the Jack the Ripper murders._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Jack the Ripper Cases:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mary Ann Nichols_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Annie Chapman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Elizabeth Stride, Catherine Eddowes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mary Jane Kelly_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;West End Adventures:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Strange Case of Dr. Goldfire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Murder of Sherlock Holmes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Case of Identity_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Death of a Transylvanian Count_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Royal Huggermugger at the Savage Club_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Simple Case of Murder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
